name: Exmilitary
description: my second favourite death grips thing. originally didnt put it here because its technically a mixtape but i dont care anymore this is the greatest mixtape ever made i pray every single day for it to come onto spotify. the kero kero bonito and tobuscus mashups are fire too im not even kidding.

name: Chaser
description: femtanyl's first album and its fire. i originally gave this an 8.5 because i thought it was really good but not a masterpiece but i slowly just kept listening to it over and over and now even though i only have 19 femtanyl songs in my playlist of 1000 femtanyl is my top artist. (its also not out in any physical form rn so just pretend this is the real front and back cover).

name: Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band
description: the best beatles album abbey road put me to sleep but this is my shit, from start to end not a single miss the people on aoty are lying to you when they say this isnt as good as abbey road and revolver. the cover is also fire, idk why they cropped ghandi out though.

name: To Pimp a Butterfly
description: iconic album and probably one of the best hiphop albums ever made. the cover is also sick. this is really short because honestly im not smart enough, american enough or black enough to correctly talk about it but all i can say is that your racist uncle wont be racist if you make him listen to this.

name: Igor
description: my favourite tyler the creator album and probably my favourite album ever. tells a story as well as having only bangers. the vinyl even has a secret song (boyfriend) which is fire and the cover really stands out, listen to it now.

name: The Money Store
description: this album got me drenched in sweat by the end of it. its like a gateway drug to more experiemental hiphop aswell as a gateway into crack. idk if id say you should buy this as the bdsm type cover probably wont leave a good impression on your friends and family.

name: My Beautiful Dark Twisted Fantasy
description: best nicki minaj verse ever on monster, best rick ross verse on devil in a new dress and runaway is probably my favourite song ever. listen to it if you havent yet. the album art is also iconic and recognisable so its pretty cool to have.

name: Ziggy Stardust and the Spider From Mars
description: basically perfect album in my mind. not a single miss, five years is a perfect start and rock 'n' roll suicide is the perfect final song. the cover is icon too, also undeniable proof david bowies from the future he predicted kanye west!!
